import React, { useState } from "react"; const EditForm = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState(""); const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const [selectedOption, setSelectedOption] = useState("false"); const [priority, setPriority] = useState("none"); const handleOptionChange = ev => { setSelectedOption(ev.target.value); }; const handlePriorityChange = ev => { console.log(ev); setPriority(ev.target.value); }; return (

setTitle(e.target.value)} id="title" />

handleOptionChange(e)} id="closed_task" />

handleOptionChange(e)} id="open_task" />

); }; export default EditForm;
